local_intent: Ensure block visibility, align to its edge, set yaw to 180 deg, execute three short pushes, and verify the tool remains at the commanded yaw.
assumptions: Target outline is already localized or not required for this micro-step
Contact alignment is sufficient for pushing without grasp
coherence_with_global: Uses visibility fallback with grid scan, precise approach and alignment, sets yaw to 180, performs three short pushes (distance 0.05, dir 180, 800 ms), then verifies orientation, matching the global plan and short timeout cadence.
